attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of understanding why someone so vile and so disgusting was elected president as well as wondering how he is still remaining president. The more I looked into the app, the more I realized that it was just terrible! All it really does is try to make him seem like he isn’t a bad guy and obviously this app is filled with lies. I can’t have an app that lies to my face 100% of the time.
attributes.title: Just as Terrible as the President

attributes.review: before I went to bed I downloaded this app and when I woke up all of my pets turned into oranges my poor bunny was a big orange and when I went to check on my dog believe it or not but SHE HAD A HIDEOUS BLONDE WIG ON WITH A BAD SPRAY TAN I tried to take the wig off of her but she built a wall every time I tried to touch her so because of this horrible experience this app will be deleted I hope you’re happy that you ruined my wonderful pets

attributes.review: When I first opened the app I could not believe my eyes. I think there was a glitch or malfunction because the first image to appear was horrific! It was a mix of momo and a chupacabras. Please if you are willingly going to download this app, you must have EXTREME precautions. I have an appointment with my eye doctor this Saturday to see if there is any hope for my vision. I don’t recommend this for anyone, and remember gen z will win.

So I downloaded it to help fight these libs ❄️ but it went into my bank information and emptied my account and idk what happened but someone changed all my social media passwords. I don’t think this is the right app. There are scammers leaking information. It did the same thing to my mom and my friend got their address leaked as well as his nudes because of it. DO NOT RECOMMEND. just got to parler or something. TRUMP 2020
attributes.title: This hacked me
